name: Potion Pandemonium
description:
In this action packed game, you, an Alchemist are on the hunt for the rare ingredients from a dying species known as the Butter Chicken due to their buttery like appearance and chicken tasting flesh.

But you must be careful as there are rogue experiments that have come to seek vengeance for what you have done to them. There is no time to produce specific potions, you must deal with what you can quickly brew while on the run, although with enough experience just by looking at the potion you can decipher what it's effects are.

Obtain the buttery goodness from the Butter Chicken and don't get caught!

Made in 5 days for Jame Gam #25 (a game jam).
